page.title: 02New House Farm
page.content: Mr Parkes has 74 pedigree fresian {cows}for dairy,and 60 young stock.And has 116 working acres of land. He milks twice a day at 6am in the morning and 3pm in the afternoon.He has a{computer feeding}system which tells him 3 things :firstly how much a cow needs to eat 2nd it prints out if it eats enough 3rd and if each cow has eaten enough .It costs him Â£49000 a year to run the farm.He has 1{employee who works full time and one milker who comes in on Mondays.You can get milk fever in a herd quite rarely.The cows eat 50 tons of{silage}a year.The milk is transported by a lorry to {Brighton}to be checked.Mr Parks has 2 trailers,3 tractors,1 bailer,1 mower,2 rollers,1 harrow,1 dung spreader,1 slurry scraper.
